tooltip.value: ${UR}Reduces the ${MR} of nearby enemy ${CH}s by ${mpen}.
${UR}+${ar} ${AR} +${mr} ${MR} +${dmg} ${AD} to nearby allied units.

${P}Grants ${AP} equal to ${ap}% of your maximum ${M}.
${UP}Each time you use an ability, your maximum ${M} increases by ${m}.
 ${cd}${SCD}
 Bonus caps at +${cap} ${M}.
${DNS}Tear of the Goddess or Manamune.

${UP}${cd}% ${CD}
${UP}Restores ${m}% of your max ${M} on Kill or Assist.
${UP}Increases your Mana Regen by ${mrinc}% per ${minc}% ${M} you are missing.
${DNS}Chalice of Harmony.
${UP}${dmg}% of your maximum ${H} is added to your ${AD}.
${AA}Death Ray sets fire to enemies, dealing ${dmg}% additional ${MD} over ${dmgtime}${S}.
${AA}Gravity Field has an additional ${range}% cast range.
${AA}Power Transfer increases Viktor's ${MV} by ${mv}% for ${mvtime}${S}.
${UP}Gain an additional 5 Gold every 10${S}.
${UP}Gain a spell shield that blocks the next incoming enemy ability.\n ${cd}${SCD}
${UP}Enhanced Movement ${mvlvl} (${DNS}other Boots)
${UA}Deals ${dmg} ${MD} and slows the target ${CH} by ${slow}% for ${slowtime}${S} (${range} range).\n ${cd}${SCD}
${UP}Enhanced Movement ${mv}, increases to Enhanced Movement ${mv2} when out of combat for ${cd}${S} (${DNS}other Boots).
${UP}Enhanced Movement ${mvlvl} (${DNS}other Boots)
${UP}Enhanced Movement ${mvlvl} (${DNS}other Boots)
${UP}On leveling up, restores ${h} ${H} and ${m} ${M} over ${len}${S}.
${UP}Increases your ${MREGEN} by ${mregen}% per ${mmiss}% ${M} you are missing.
${UP}+${cd}% ${CD}\n${UA}Deals ${MD} to target ${CH} equal to ${dmg}% of their current health (+${dmgadd}% per ${dmgper} Ability Power) with a minimum of ${dmgmin} damage.\n ${dmgcd}${MCD}
${C2C}Grants 12-22% ${AS}, based on ${CH} level, and 8% ${CRIT} for ${len}${MINS}.
${C2C}Grants 20-40 ${AP}, based on ${CH} level, 10% ${CD} for ${len}${MINS}.
${C2C}Grants 140-235 ${H} based on ${CH} level, and 10 ${AD} for ${len}${MINS}.
${UR}Nearby allied ${CH}s gain ${hregen} ${HREGEN}.

${P}${slowchance}% chance on hit to reduce your target's ${MV} by ${slow}% for ${slowlen}${S}.\n${UA}For ${len}${S}, your attacks reduce your target's ${MV} by ${slow}% and deal ${dmg} ${TD} over ${slowlen}${S}.\n ${cd}${SCD}

${UP}Your ${BA}s apply a mark to the target that deals ${dmg} bonus ${MD} each second for ${dmglen}${S}.\n${UA}Inflicts target enemy ${CH} with Grievous Wound, causing ${hreduc}% reduced healing and regeneration for ${hreduclen}${S}.\n ${cd}${SCD}
${UP}Restores ${hregen}% of your maximum ${H} every second.
${UP}+${cd}% ${CD}\n${UR}Reduces the ${AS} of nearby enemies by ${asreduc}%.
${UP}Your ${BA}s reduce your target's ${MV} by ${mslow}% for ${slowlen}${S} (${rslow}% for ranged attacks).
${UP}Revives your ${CH} upon death, restoring ${h} ${H} and ${m} ${M}.\n ${cd}${MCD}
${UP}On ${BA} or ability use, increases your ${AS} by ${as}% and ${AP} by ${ap}.\n Lasts ${len}${S} (stacks up to ${cap} times).
${UP}+${mpen} ${MPEN}
${C2C}Restores ${h} ${H} over ${len}${S}.
${UP}Gain an additional 5 Gold every 10${S}.
${UP}If you would take ${MD} that would leave you at less than ${hlimit}% ${H}, you first gain a shield that absorbs ${shield} ${MD} for ${shieldlen}${S}.\n ${cd}${SCD}
${UP}+${sv}% ${SV}\n${UA}Deals ${dmg} ${MD} and slows the target ${CH}'s ${MV} by ${slow}% for ${slowlen}${S} (${range} range).\n ${cd}${SCD}
${UP}Your critical strikes now deal ${crit}% damage instead of 200%.
${UP}${cd}% ${CD}\n${UP}Enhanced Movement ${mv} (${DNS}other Boots)
${UP}Every fourth ${BA} unleashes a chain lightning, dealing ${dmg} ${MD} to up to ${target} targets.
${UP}Gain an additional 5 Gold every 10${S}.
${UP}Your ${BA}s deal ${MD} equal to ${dmg}% of the target's maximum ${H}.
${UP}+${arpen}% ${APEN}

${UP}Your ${CH} gains ${gain} ${H} per stack, receiving 2 stacks for a kill or 1 stack for an assist.\n This effect can stack 20 times; you lose a third of your stacks if you die.\n At 20 stacks, your ${CH} takes ${dmgreduc}% less damage.
${UP}After using an ability, your next ${BA} gains bonus ${PD} equal to your ${AP}\n ${cd}${SCD}\n${DNS}Sheen or Trinity Force.
${UR}Nearby allied ${CH}s gain ${hregen} ${HREGEN}.\n${UA}Shield yourself and nearby allies for ${len}${S}, absorbing up to ${shield} (+${shieldgain} per level) damage\n ${cd}${SCD}
${UP}Your ${BA}s deal bonus ${MD} equal to ${dmg}% of the target's maximum ${H}.
${UP}Your ${BA}s against minions and monsters have a ${chance}% chance to deal ${dmg} bonus ${MD}.
${UP}Your ${BA}s deal ${dmg} bonus ${MD} and reduce the target's ${MR} by ${shred} for ${len}${S}.\n Effect stacks up to ${stacks} times.
${UR}Nearby allied ${CH}s gain ${mregen} ${MREGEN}.
${C2C}Restores ${m} ${M} over ${len}${S}.

${UP}Grants ${AD} equal to ${dmg}% of your maximum ${M}.
${UP}Each time you ${BA}, your maximum ${M} increases by ${again}.
 ${cd}${SCD}
Each time you use an ability, your maximum ${M} increases by ${mgain}.
 ${cd}${SCD}
 Bonus caps at ${mcap} ${M}.
${DNS}Tear of the Goddess or Archangel's Staff.

${UP}+${ad} ${AD} for every ${h}% health missing.\n${UP}If you would take ${MD} which would leave you at less than ${maxh}% of your maximum health, you gain a shield which absorbs ${mdmg} ${MD} for ${len}${S}.\n ${cd}${SCD}

${UP}Your ${CH} gains ${gain} ${AP} per stack, receiving 2 stacks for a kill or 1 stack for an assist.\n This effect can stack 20 times; you lose a third of your stacks if you die.\n At 20 stacks, your ${CH} gains ${cd}% ${CD}
${UP}Enhanced Movement ${mv} (${DNS}other Boots)
${UP}Reduces the damage taken from non-turret ${BA}s by ${dmgreduc}%.\n${UP}Enhanced Movement ${mv} (${DNS}other Boots)
${UP}Reduces and stores ${dmgstore}% of the ${MD} dealt to your ${CH}.\n${UA}Deals ${dmgbase} + (stored magic) [max: ${dmgcap}] to nearby enemy units.\n ${cd} second cooldown
${C2C}Grants stealth detection for ${len}${MINS} or until your ${CH} dies.
${C2C}Grants stealth detection until your ${CH} dies.
${UP}Your ${BA}s have a ${chance}% chance to slow your target's ${MV} by ${slow}% for ${slowlen}${S}.
${UP}Gain an additional 5 Gold every 10${S}.
${UP}+${h} Health\n (${DNS}other Prospector items)
${UP}+${h} Health\n (${DNS}other Prospector items)
${UA}Removes all debuffs from your ${CH}.\n ${cd}${SCD}
${UP}Increases ${AP} by ${ap}%
${P}Your ${CH} gains ${h} ${H}, ${m} ${M}, and ${ap} ${AP} every${MIN} (up to ${cap} times).\n${UP}On leveling up, restores 250 Health and 200 Mana over 8${S}.
${UP}Dealing ${SD} slows the target's ${MV} by ${mslow}% for ${len}${S} (${rslow}% for multi-target and damage-over-time spells).
${P}Your ${BA}s grant +${dmg} ${AD} and +${ls}% ${LS} for ${len}${S}\n Effect stacks up to ${cap} times.
${UP}After using an ability, your next ${BA} deals bonus ${PD} equal to your base ${AD}.\n ${cd}${SCD}\n${DNS}Trinity Force or Lich Bane.
${UP}+${cdreduc}% ${CD}\n${UA}Nearby allied ${CH}s gain ${mv}% ${MV} for ${mvlen}${S}.\n ${cd}${SCD}
${C2C}Places an invisible ward that can see visible enemy units.\n Lasts ${len}${MINS}.
${UP}Enhanced Movement ${mv} (${DNS}other Boots)
${UR}Nearby allied ${CH}s gain ${cd} ${CD} and ${mregen} ${MREGEN}.
${UP}Reduces ability cooldowns by ${cd}% and increases your healing and regeneration effects on yourself by ${hregen}%.
${UP}Deals ${dmg} ${MD} per second to nearby enemies.

${UP}Your ${CH} gains 5 damage per stack, receiving 2 stacks for a kill or 1 stack for an assist.\n This effect can stack 20 times; you lose a third of your stacks if you die.\n At 20 stacks, your ${CH}'s ${MV} is increased by ${mv}%.

${UP}Each time you use an ability, your maximum ${M} increases by ${m}.
 ${cd}${SCD}
 Bonus caps at +${cap} Mana.
${DNS}Archangel's Staff or Manamune.
${UP}Your ${BA}s reduce your target's ${AR} by ${arreduc} for ${len}${S}.\n Effect stacks up to ${cap} times.
${P}Gain bonus +${ad} ${AD} and +${ls}% ${LS} per kill.\n Bonuses cap at +40 ${AD} and 10% ${LS}.\n Half of the bonuses are lost upon death.
${UP}+${cd}% ${CD}\n${UP}+${apen} ${APEN}.
${P}Your ${BA}s grant vision of your target for ${len}${S}.
${UP}On being hit by ${BA}s, returns ${dmg}% of damage taken as ${MD}.
${P}Your ${BA}s splash, dealing ${mdmg}% area damage around the target (${rdmg}% for ranged attacks).
${C2C}Places an invisible ward that reveals the surrounding area stealthed units in the area.\n Lasts ${len}${MINS}.
${UP}+${mpen}% ${MPEN}
${UP}${chance}% chance on being hit by ${BA}s to slow the attacker's ${MV} and ${AS} by ${slow}% for ${slowlen}${S}.
${P}Minion kills permanently grant ${h} ${H} and ${hregen} ${HREGEN}. ${CH} kills and assists grant ${h2} ${H} and ${hregen2} ${HREGEN}.\n Bonuses cap at +${hcap} ${H}, and +${hregencap} ${HREGEN}.
${UR}Grants nearby allied ${CH}s ${ap} ${AP} and ${sv}% ${SV}
${UP}Your ${BA}s deal ${dmg} bonus ${MD}.\n${UP}Your ${BA}s increase your ${MR} by ${mr} for ${len}${S} (stacks up to ${cap} times).

${UP}Your ${BA}s against minions and monsters have a ${chance}% chance to deal ${dmg} bonus ${MD}.\n${UA}Places an invisible Sight Ward that reveals the surrounding area for ${len}${MINS}.\n ${len}${MCD}
${UP}+${cd}% ${CD}\n${UR}Grants nearby allied ${CH}s ${ls}% ${LS} and ${as}% ${AS}.
${UA}Places your ${CH} into Stasis for ${len}${S}, rendering you invulnerable and untargetable but unable to take any action.\n ${cd}${SCD}
